rules1: Draw a card. Return a card. If you have the fewest 1 point fixes, steal a 1 point fix.
rules2: Look at the top card of the deck. You may score it, discard it, or return a card and keep it.

rules1: Draw a card. Return a card. If you have the fewest 1 point fixes, steal a 1 point fix.
rules2:
Always: Play with your plan revealed.
 Activate: rotate both your equipment.

rules1: Draw a card. Return a card. If you have the fewest 1 point fixes, steal a 1 point fix.
rules2: Look at your opponents plan. You may score it.

rules1: Look at the top card of the deck. You may score it, discard it, or return a card and keep it.
rules2:
Always: Play with your plan revealed.
 Activate: rotate both your equipment.

rules1: Look at the top card of the deck. You may score it, discard it, or return a card and keep it.
rules2: Look at your opponents plan. You may score it.

rules1:
Always: Play with your plan revealed.
 Activate: rotate both your equipment.
rules2: Look at your opponents plan. You may score it.

rules1: Up to 2 times: Swap an Equipped card with your plan.
rules2: Draw 2 cards. Return 2 cards.

rules1: Up to 2 times: Swap an Equipped card with your plan.
rules2: Draw 2 cards: Equip 1, Discard the other. Return an Equipped card.

rules1: Up to 2 times: Swap an Equipped card with your plan.
rules2: You and a player each select and trade a card.

rules1: Draw 2 cards. Return 2 cards.
rules2: Draw 2 cards: Equip 1, Discard the other. Return an Equipped card.

rules1: Draw 2 cards. Return 2 cards.
rules2: You and a player each select and trade a card.

rules1: Draw 2 cards: Equip 1, Discard the other. Return an Equipped card.
rules2: You and a player each select and trade a card.

rules1: Rotate 1 or 2 of your Equipment cards.
rules2: Draw a card. Discard a card.

rules1: Rotate 1 or 2 of your Equipment cards.
rules2: Look at the top 2 cards of the deck. Return or Discard them.

rules1: Rotate 1 or 2 of your Equipment cards.
rules2: A foe may score their plan as a fragment. Activate 1 of their Items facing them 2x.

rules1: Draw a card. Discard a card.
rules2: Look at the top 2 cards of the deck. Return or Discard them.

rules1: Draw a card. Discard a card.
rules2: A foe may score their plan as a fragment. Activate 1 of their Items facing them 2x.

rules1: Look at the top 2 cards of the deck. Return or Discard them.
rules2: A foe may score their plan as a fragment. Activate 1 of their Items facing them 2x.

rules1: Draw a card. Return an Equipped card. Equip a card and activate it.
rules2: Discard 2 cards. Draw 2 cards.

rules1: Draw a card. Return an Equipped card. Equip a card and activate it.
rules2: Rotate 1 of another player's Equipment.

rules1: Draw a card. Return an Equipped card. Equip a card and activate it.
rules2: Look at the top 4 cards of the deck, Return them in any order.

rules1: Discard 2 cards. Draw 2 cards.
rules2: Rotate 1 of another player's Equipment.

rules1: Discard 2 cards. Draw 2 cards.
rules2: Look at the top 4 cards of the deck, Return them in any order.

rules1: Rotate 1 of another player's Equipment.
rules2: Look at the top 4 cards of the deck, Return them in any order.

name: x0.1
rules1: Swap this card with the Paradox. Rotate 1 of your Equipment.
rules2: Discard a card. Look at 3 cards from the deck, Draw 1, Return the rest.

name: x0.2
rules1: Swap this card with the Paradox. Rotate 1 of your Equipment.
rules2: Score your plan as a fragment.

name: x0.3
rules1: Swap this card with the Paradox. Rotate 1 of your Equipment.
rules2: Swap one of your equipment cards with the paradox.

name: x0.4
rules1: Discard a card. Look at 3 cards from the deck, Draw 1, Return the rest.
rules2: Score your plan as a fragment.

name: x0.5
rules1: Discard a card. Look at 3 cards from the deck, Draw 1, Return the rest.
rules2: Swap one of your equipment cards with the paradox.

name: x0.6
rules1: Score your plan as a fragment.
rules2: Swap one of your equipment cards with the paradox.

name: x1.1
rules1: Discard a card. Draw 2 cards. Return a card.
rules2: For each card in your Equipment: either Discard it and Draw a card, or Rotate it.

name: x1.2
rules1: Discard a card. Draw 2 cards. Return a card.
rules2: Return this card. its owner Draws 1 card. Swap a card with a player's plan.

name: x1.3
rules1: Discard a card. Draw 2 cards. Return a card.
rules2: Swap 2 cards scored as a fragment with another player's card scored for 2 points.

name: x1.4
rules1: For each card in your Equipment: either Discard it and Draw a card, or Rotate it.
rules2: Return this card. its owner Draws 1 card. Swap a card with a player's plan.

name: x1.5
rules1: For each card in your Equipment: either Discard it and Draw a card, or Rotate it.
rules2: Swap 2 cards scored as a fragment with another player's card scored for 2 points.

name: x1.6
rules1: Return this card. its owner Draws 1 card. Swap a card with a player's plan.
rules2: Swap 2 cards scored as a fragment with another player's card scored for 2 points.

name: x2.1
rules1: Discard an Equipped card. Draw a card. Equip a card and activate it.
rules2: Rotate all Equipment. Discard a card. Draw a card.

name: x2.2
rules1: Discard an Equipped card. Draw a card. Equip a card and activate it.
rules2: Re-score for 2 points a card that you have scored as a fragment.

name: x2.3
rules1: Discard an Equipped card. Draw a card. Equip a card and activate it.
rules2: Swap any card scored as a fragment with the Paradox. You may score your plan.

name: x2.4
rules1: Rotate all Equipment. Discard a card. Draw a card.
rules2: Re-score for 2 points a card that you have scored as a fragment.

name: x2.5
rules1: Rotate all Equipment. Discard a card. Draw a card.
rules2: Swap any card scored as a fragment with the Paradox. You may score your plan.

name: x2.6
rules1: Re-score for 2 points a card that you have scored as a fragment.
rules2: Swap any card scored as a fragment with the Paradox. You may score your plan.

name: -x0.1
rules1:
Always: You score perfect matches for 2 points.
Activate: Draw 2 cards. Discard 2 cards.
rules2:
Always: When scoring this treat it as any item.
Activate: rotate an Equipped card.

name: -x0.2
rules1:
Always: You score perfect matches for 2 points.
Activate: Draw 2 cards. Discard 2 cards.
rules2: Swap any card with the Paradox. Your opponent may score their plan as a fragment.

name: -x0.3
rules1:
Always: You score perfect matches for 2 points.
Activate: Draw 2 cards. Discard 2 cards.
rules2: Draw 2 cards from the bottom of the deck. Discard 2 cards.

name: -x0.4
rules1:
Always: When scoring this treat it as any item.
Activate: rotate an Equipped card.
rules2: Swap any card with the Paradox. Your opponent may score their plan as a fragment.

name: -x0.5
rules1:
Always: When scoring this treat it as any item.
Activate: rotate an Equipped card.
rules2: Draw 2 cards from the bottom of the deck. Discard 2 cards.

name: -x0.6
rules1: Swap any card with the Paradox. Your opponent may score their plan as a fragment.
rules2: Draw 2 cards from the bottom of the deck. Discard 2 cards.
